name: react-graphql-template
description: A React GraphQL Holochain hApp demonstrating how to use GraphQL with Holochain

scripts.hc:install: yarn install && cd ui_src && yarn install
scripts.hc:config: cd dna_src && hc test --testfile test/config-generate.js | tee conductor-output.txt && node test/config-copy.js
scripts.hc:start: npm run sandbox-create && concurrently "npm:ui:start" "npm run sandbox-run"
scripts.sandbox-create: rm -rf ~/tmp && mkdir ~/tmp && hc s clean && hc s create --root ~/tmp/ -n 3 network -b https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic && hc s call 0 1 2 install-app-bundle ./dna_src/zomes/1.hashes/hashes.happ

author: Philip Beadle <philip.beadle@holo.host>
